channel.title: Need help on how to get friends server to portforward
channel.description: hey, i already know how to get a server active.. but like my friends comp is different.. and i did the same for him as i did for myself and no luck.. so if someone could tell me how to portforward.. his platform is vista like mine.. thanks bye

item.title: Need help on how to get friends server to portforward
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Try reseting his router. There should be a little button on the back of it you’ll need like a pen or a needle to push it in with. Then portforward. It should work.
